title.narrative: IR 5.1 PREPARATION AUX REPONSES D'URGENC

description.narrative: IR 5.1. By the end of 2018, a strategy is developed and validated by governmental and non-governmental stakeholders, and the UNICEF ability to respond to new emergencies in an efficient, responsive, and tailored way is strengthened in order to strengthen national capacities in risk reduction and emergency management.

related-activity.ref: 0990/A0/06/005 PREPARATION A L URGENCE ET TRANSITION

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: IR 5.1. By the end of 2018, a strategy is developed and validated by governmental and non-governmental stakeholders, and the UNICEF ability to respond to new emergencies in an efficient, responsive, and tailored way is strengthened in order to strengthen national capacities in risk reduction and emergency management.

description.narrative: In collaboration with the Ministry of National Solidarity and Humanitarian Affairs (SGAH) and the Caritas network, UNICEF supported the extension of the early warning and humanitarian surveillance system from 12 provinces in 2018 to 17 provinces (100% of the target) in 2019. During the reporting period, 686 humanitarian alerts were recorded. All nine UNICEF field offices completed their emergency preparedness plans and have at least one staff member trained on EPR (Emergency, Preparedness, and Response). | Status:Met | As-of Date:08/02/2020

title.narrative: A work plan is established and implemented with the Ministry of Social Affairs and Humanitarian Action.[Un plan de travail est tabli et mis en uvre avec le Ministre des Affaires Sociales et de l'Action Humanitaire.]

Strengthened emergency response capacity in at least seven provinces where RRMP (Rponse Rapide aux Mouvements de PopulationRapid Response to Population Movements) is not implemented.[Capacit de rponse en urgence renforce dans au moins sept provinces ne bnficiant pas du programme RRMP (Rponse Rapide aux Mouvements de Population).]
Number of UNICEF offices with at least one staff member trained in EPR (Emergency, Preparedness, and Response).[# de bureau Unicef ayant au moins un staff bnficiant d'une formation EPR.]
AMP - Availability of a new Operational modalities (accountability framework, action plan, SOPs, funding strategy) for UNICEF DRC humanitarian action
AMP - Availability of new UNICEF DRC humanitarian strategy
